This is a dupe for me (note that there is a light crease horizontally about chin level).  Looking to trade this plus any SGC 10 of your choice ([URL="http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=130439"]see post listing 18 available[/URL]) for any SGC 30 I don't already have ([URL="http://sgccardregistry.com/set.aspx?cat=1&set=239&userset=5307"]reference my set registry[/URL])
